thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Yuyuan Tourist Mart Gets Regulatory Approval For Asset Acquisition, Share Trade To Resume

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Yuyuan Tourist Mart Gets Regulatory Approval For Asset Acquisition, Share Trade To Resume

organizations.name: shanghai yuyuan tourist mart co ltd
brief-shanghai yuyuan tourist mart gets regulatory approval for asset acquisition

text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Shanghai Yuyuan Tourist Mart Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT GETS SECURITIES REGULATOR'S APPROVAL FOR ASSET ACQUISITION, SHARE TRADE TO RESUME ON FEB 1 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2EtLMS0 Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
